title: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. When running the code provided in tests/new/binaryWarnings/.., the problem can be observed. It should be noted that these tests may produce false positives since filename checking is not enabled in harness verification of messages. In AJDT, if the filename doesn't make sense, it is omitted.
OB: The source path in declare warning messages targeting .class files from injars is listed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main.class'.
EB: The source path in declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars should be listed in the correct form 'app/Main.class'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Run the provided code in tests/new/binaryWarnings/..
2. Check the declare warning messages and observe that the source path is listed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main.class'.
